com.grt192.mechanism
Class GRTRobotBase

java.lang.Object
  com.grt192.core.Mechanism
      com.grt192.mechanism.GRTRobotBase

public class GRTRobotBase
extends Mechanism

A Robot base consisting of a GRTDriveTrain, Gyroscope and accelerometer that can be driven around

Author:
anand
